thread.title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil really doesn’t turn up in the big games, according to the statistics
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil really doesn’t turn up in the big games, according to the statistics

author: dfraser
title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil really doesn’t turn up in the big games, according to the statistics
text:
6 Mesut Ozil has typically struggled against teams in the top six since joining Arsenal 
While goal-scoring has never really been his forte, Ozil is renowned for his gifting passing ability, most notably his knack for assisting a team-mate for a goal. 
Against the top six he's handed out a big, fat ZERO assists... 
When coming up against the rest of the league however, he's doled out infinitely more at four. Getty Images Mesut Ozil has often been known to disappear in the so-called 'big matches' RELATED STORIES STEVE CLARIDGE Claudio Ranieri is great... but with the champions slipping towards drop zone, it could be time for him to go Brady's Super shirt mystery Super Bowl hero Tom Brady jokes he'll have to be glued to Ebay after jersey is stolen SOD'S LLOR Swansea striker Fernando Llorente reveals Premier League relegation scrap cost him move to Chelsea Hull-bent on survival Harry Maguire excited for Arsenal clash as Hull continue to stick to fingers up to critics Dragon's fired up! Rhys Webb insists Wales are not scared of Eddie Jones’ invincible England team HERE WE JOE England to appoint Joe Root as skipper with Ben Stokes his No.2 after Alastair Cook steps down IAN WRIGHT Lazy Leicester stars' pitiful lack of fight means they are at risk of ruining their title legacy Mad for it Antoine Griezmann wants to be the new David Beckham as blockbuster £60million move to Manchester United takes a step closer COOK'S RECIPE Alastair Cook never had the attributes of a great England captain.. but hidden work made sure he was AUBA THE MOON Manchester City to go all-out for Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang if Sergio Aguero leaves this summer SA'U CONFIDENT Salford star Junior Sa'u sure he won't need to pray for Salford's Super League survival again STOKE-ING THE FLAMES Charlie Adam continues war of words between Stoke and West Brom over Saido Berahino drugs ban leak 
It's a similar story when it comes to chances created, where he's set-up team-mates an impressive 48 chances against the smaller sides, or 3.3 per game. 
Against the top clubs however, it's a mere 2.2 per game - 11 all season. 
Even his general passing stats make for disappointing reading as he dishes out just 58 per game against the giants, compared to 70 against the rest of the league as he looks to dominate in the middle. AP:Associated Press 6 Mesut Ozils stats drop across the board against team's in the top six 
His accuracy has been 0.1 per cent better, however that is the only statistic in which he improves against the top sides. 
So there you have it, if you ever find yourself wondering if Ozil really does disappear in the big games, he actually does by his own high standards...
